name: MOMO.EXE
description: Horror game where you need to do different tasks from horror creature received by your phone. And remember: Don't chat with MOMO!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (x64) Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
